fields.name: The Great Gatsby
fields.description: A classic novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald exploring themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

fields.name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
fields.description: Yuval Noah Harari's fascinating look at the history and future of the human species.

fields.name: Becoming
fields.description: Michelle Obama's inspiring memoir about her journey through life and the White House.

fields.name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
fields.description: J.K. Rowling's magical adventure about a boy discovering his wizarding heritage.

fields.name: The Silent Patient
fields.description: A psychological thriller by Alex Michaelides about a woman's silence and a therapist's obsession.

fields.name: Atomic Habits
fields.description: James Clear's practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.
